mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member ( member_nickname, member_email, member_password ) values(#{memberNickname}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword})
mapper.select: select member_id, member_email, member_password, member_nickname, member_region, member_register_date, member_is_expert, member_is_remaining, member_file_name, member_file_original_name, member_file_path, member_file_size from tbl_member where member_id = #{memberId}
